1112.content:
You awaken from what felt like a rough sleep, slowly opening your eyes while getting up rubbing the front of your head as if you had a bad headache. As you regained your senses, you noticed that you aren't in your room anymore, but somewhere else, somewhere different. Not only that, but you realized that you have shrunk in size, being only a measly 3 inches tall based on the surroundings of which had a chair next to you.

You sit down and had a think to yourself, trying to remember the last thing you did as well what happened before you ended up in this situation. After thinking for a bit, you remembered what happened. You were playing Pokémon Platinum, but this wasn't just a normal start to finish run of the game, you were doing a challenge run in which you were going to beat it but with a team of Lucario's, as you wanted to give yourself a challenge of beating a Pokémon game with only one Pokémon, and Lucario was the one you picked randomly out of all of the choices you made.

You spent some time breeding a Lucario you trained to max level for eggs which would hatch into Riolu's, picking out the ones with good enough natures and put the others in the PC for later to send off to other players in the more recent games at a later date. It took some time, but not as long as you thought it would, ending up with 6 Lucario's on your team all ready at a good level for the start of the game and moves learned to transfer over in which you did shortly after getting your other game ready with the random wild Pokémon you caught to be traded over for the Lucario's. Shortly after starting the adventure, before you got your first gym, you started to feel funny, like you were starting to get a headache, not only that but you started to see that the game generally during battle would go and say how the Lucario wants to see you in person. At this point, you knew that you might as well stop right then for now and get some rest, you got yourself ready to go to bed, but before you could get to sleep, you started to feel more off as your body started shaking as if you were cold, but before you could react, a flash of light flashed though your window startling you only for a portal to materialize right above your bed and then sucked you in without warning. The force of the portal sucking you in caused you to pass out almost instantly.

It was all coming together now, you were going to do a run of a Pokemon game with nothing but Lucario's, and now you are tiny somewhere after being sucked into a portal, the only difference is that you don't feel that bad headache anymore, you sit down where you are and sighed to yourself, "What am I going to do now" you said to yourself, you have no clue where you are, your tiny and not only that, you are in great danger due to your size as anything could crush you like a bug.

Your trail of thoughts gets interrupted by a loud piercing noise coming from being you, which caused you to leap in the air in shock, only for you to bolt around quickly to see that it was from an alarm clock, but something close to it caught your attention even more than the alarm clock, it was a Lucario, and by the looks of things, he was waking up from his sleep. You noticed the Lucario's eyes slowly opening up and how he is laying on its bed, its likely to spot you. You had no other option but to hide somewhere, anywhere out of his vision, who knows what he is like, being in his room, he could think you are an intruder or some kind of pest. You've read enough stories about scenarios like this to have a hunch where this was going to go. You made a dash towards the closest thing you could hide under, a bedroom cabinet, it had a gap at the bottom where you could hide until he has either left the room or you find some way to get out alive, as you got closer to it, you turned around to see if he has spotted you yet, and with your bad luck, it looks like the Lucario has as he has fully awoken from his sleep and seemed wide awake, that was the last thing you need.

"Crap" you thought to yourself as you continued to dash your way to your hiding place, but one thing you heard was the Lucario go, "What even is that thing there", based on its voice, you could determine it was Male. You just made it to your hiding place before the Lucario got off his bed to see what it is, with the last amount of breaths you had you moved as far away from the area you came from so the Lucario couldn't reach you.

You thought the Lucario would probably not have noticed you, but you heard the Lucario say “Is it me, or did something go under there?” From what you could make out of it, the Lucario is a male one based on his voice. From the gap of the cabinet you were under, you saw the Lucario make his way towards where you were, all you could do is think to yourself how this can get any worse as well as this probably wouldn’t happen or even be less than likely to happen if you were smaller, but that would cause even more problems as well in some ways.

You decided to go and hide behind one of the legs of the cabinet that was facing the wall in a way that would make it harder for the Lucario to spot you, the Lucario got to the area you were hiding by and started to look under it. You didn’t want to look behind where you were hiding as that could easily give away your hiding location. Unknown to you that would last long as Lucario would know you were there by sensing the Aura being generated by you. You hear the Lucario say, “I know your hiding, you can’t go hiding forever, you have to come out sometime”. He’s right, you have to come out sometime, but not now you thought. You then continued to check around the gaps from where you were hiding to see if he has moved away, which seems like it but before you could move somewhere else, the cabinet started to move, you froze only for about three seconds before making a leap towards where it got moved to, but before you could move any further, you were grabbed by the Lucario, you let out a noise of shock as soon as the Lucario grabbed you. “Got you” you hear the Lucario go as he pulled you from under the cabinet. You closed your eyes and began fearing for the worse for what he has in store for you, as he pulled you closer to his face, you hear him say “Hey there, what is a little thing like you doing here”, you slowly open your eyes and saw in front of you the Lucario that was looking for you, judging by his facial expression he had, he seemed to be…
1112.title: 3 inches tall

1113.content:
You wake up in a completely blue area. all you see around you are patches of bright blue fur. As you stir, you begin to realize that the ground is moving. struggling to keep your balance, you grab onto the ground, but it quickly jerks up, and you soon realize that you are in front of the giant face of a lucario. He scans you up and down and opens his giant mouth to talk, sending a huge gust of hot air at your face.
"HELLO LITTLE BUDDY! YOURE PROBABLY WONDERING WHY YOURE HERE, ARENT YOU?"
you struggle to respond, "yeah, kinda..."
"WELL IVE BEEN REALLY BUSY LATELY AND IVE DECIDED I COULD USE SOME RELAXATION."
you say impatiently, "ok...where do i come in?"
"OH YOU DONT KNOW HOW I RELAX DO YOU? I LIKE HAVING MY GIANT BODY WORSHIPED BY LITTLE BUDDIES LIKE YOU" lucario chuckled at the thought of you worshipping his body.
"i dont remember signing up for this..." you say angrily and confusedly.
"AS IF YOU HAVE A CHOICE! DONT WORRY, WELL TAKE IT EASY. IM A PRETTY CLEAN CREATURE...UNLESS YOU MAKE ME MAD..."
with that, lucario was done listening to you complain.
"ALRIGHT LIL BUDDY. WHERE SHOULD WE START....?"

11131.content:
Lucario doesnt say a word but begins to lower you down to the ground. As he sets you down you notice two gigantic shoes.
"I didnt know you wear shoes, lucario" you say kind of scared where this was going.
"OF COURSE I WEAR SHOES BUDDY. HOW ELSE CAN I GET THE FULL SCENT?" he replied, moving one foot to the heel of the other to pry it off. As soon as you heard the gigantic POP sound, the room immediately filled with a noxious odor resembling cheese and sweat.
Lucario notices the change in your facial expression and chuckles heartily.
"ARE YOU KIDDING, BOY? I DIDNT EVEN TAKE OFF THE OTHER ONE AND YOURE ALREADY GAGGING?...WELL I GUESS I CANT EXPECT MUCH. MY LAST FOOT SLAVE PASSED OUT UNDER THEM" he said wiggling his socked toes, only releasing more hot foot sweat into the air.
He used the socked foot to then pry off his other shoe, cracking his masculine toes as he did it.
As the other shoe came off more sweaty scent moved into the air, causing it to be thick and damp.
"AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH....MUCH BETTER" he said as he sat down and put his two gigantic feet in front of you. He wiggled his toes in front of you to get the full effect of his manly feet.
"SMELL GOOD DOWN THERE LIL BUDDY? THEY STINK FROM UP HERE...CANT IMAGINE WHAT ITS LIKE FOR YOU...OH WELL....READY? WHERE TO START...."

1121.content:
you were walking down a long and lonesome road playing your nintendo DS, the game was Pokemon diamond. in the game you had removed all your other pokemon and left just lucario. every seemed to be normal for you, when suddenly, while your character was walking down a path the game suddenly stopped. you were confused for a minute, then your character changed into your lucario and walked in a building.

unfortunatly, because you weren't paying attention to where you were walking you trip on a stick in your path, dropping your DS which lands on a rock and breaks in half. just as you look at it in sorrow a strange blue mist begins to pour out of it, the mist quickly envelops you. you start to fell like your falling through nothing. eventually the mist clears and you can see what happened.

you appear to be in a house, except that everything is huge, measuring yourself against a nearby table you guess that you are 6 inches tall. suddenly you feel the ground shake, and then it shakes again in some kind of rythem, like a person walking forward.

you turn around to see what is causeing these mini earthquakes.

"OH.........MY..........GOD"!
you shout in your mind, the cause of the earthquakes is a gigantic lucario. your not sure if it's aware of your presence or not!

1121221.content:
You stare up at her, just waiting until she get up. Several things might go wrong if you decide to climb up now, so waiting until she leaves seems like the best idea.

After a few minutes, she stands and yawns loudly, "Hmm... This day has been boring so far..." She looks around then walks away, in the opposite direction your in. "Shes gone." you think. You start climbing the couch before she comes back, not exactly the easiest thing to do.

After a minute or so, you finally reach the top, tired enough to drop on the ground. The only thing you can think of right now is hoping that when she comes back, she would help you. Its too late at the moment to climb back down or think of a new plan, so all you can do is wait for her to return...

112122112.content:
When this giant Lucario girl came back into the room, you could get a better look at her from where you were standing on the couch.

She was wearing attire that would allow her to leave and look decent in public, but also be comfortable while at her house: Loose, plain, white T-Shirt, loose jeans, that sort of thing, her legs seemed to be digitgrade, so it wasn't clear if she wore shoes or not. After the scanning of her attire ended, now on to her body. Her breasts looked small under that loose T-shirt, about softball size from the looks of them. Her waist seemed skinny and her hips wide. Before she turned to sit down on the couch, she turned around and gave her ass a squeeze.

When she sat back down on the couch her buttocks laded safely one whole cushion away from you at the edge of the couch. She seemed to be holding a red Nintendo DSi not unlike the one you broke just minutes ago. But you were in to much shock at the marvel before you to mourn your lost hand held system. "Do I need to do anything else today?" She said to herself. "I don't think so. Well, since I'm not doing anything or expecting anyone today. Let's just slip out of these clothes real quick." She said as she reached for the underside of her shirt to lift it off. But as she started lifting her shirt off, she froze dead in her tracks.

Did she see you?
112122112.title: Back to the Couch.

1121221121.content:
Her eyes dart directly towards you, after what seemed like hours of staring into each other's eyes, she breaks the silence first. "HOLY SHIT! WHO THE FUCK ARE YOU!?!" She screamed. Surprised at the sudden break in silence, you stay silent. "Who. And what. The fuck. Are you." She repeated. "First off, my name is Ethan. Secondly, I am a human. Lastly, sorry about this whole course of events that transpired thus far." You reply, with somehow regaining all of your composure. The massive Lucario was now over you. "You have some explaining to do... hue-Man... starting with how you got in my house." She said, her voice indicating she was in a bit of a panic.

You spend the next three hours explaining to her everything that happened prior to this discussion and her seeing you and you almost seeing her breasts. It took three hours because she was having trouble grasping the situation. She went to get some coffee and has curled up in the fetal position on the couch. "So you were just magically transported here by your broken DS and you don't know why you are so small?" She asked, seeing if she got it all correct. "That's basically the basics of it." You reply, confirming what she said.

She began to rub her temples. "Oh, man. This is a lot to comprehend." She said after thoroughly massaging the sides of her head. "Its just as bad for me. Believe me. I'm not used to 50 ft tall Lucarios talking to me. Well. At all!" You finished. "But how are you so composed? Wait 50 feet tall? I'm only 6 feet ten inches tall. Taller than average but nowhere near fifty feet." She replied worridly. "For your first question: No clue what so fucking ever. For the second: I probably shrunk when I was teleported here." You reply as if this was a normal, everyday occurrence. "You act like you have done this before." She notices. "I can assure you that I have never been to an alternate universe before and the shock will probably hit me in anywhere from three minutes to three hours from now." You reply, once again, nonchalantly. "I don't believe I ever got your name, Miss----" You paused for her to answer. "Jackie. But people who know me well call me "Rackie" sometimes." She replied. "Nice to meet you Jackie, and if you don't mind, why do some people call you "Rackie"?" You inquire. "You would know if I didn't see you before I got my shirt off." She replied, slightly blushing. "Oh, well then." You say. Jackie was going to ask more questions but she was interrupted by a loud growl. "Was that your stomach?" You ask, starting to get worried. "Yeah. I guess it's lunch time. Oh, and don't worry about me eating you or whatever. You seem like a nice guy." She said reassuringly. "So, uh, shall we get something to eat?"

"I made you or got a tiny bed for you to sleep on. I didn't know what to do with you, until I decided to make you my child." You felt shocked by this and asked him, "Child?! Why are making me your child?" He then said, "We'll my girlfriend named Violet told me about having children. I agreed to this idea except we've never had children before. And when I saw you maybe me and Violet could take care of you like a child. Sure it's strange but you could help us on taking care of a child since you are eight. And once we know how to take care of a child we could use have a child of own and you could either leave or stay with us." You thought about this looking at the photo thinking, sure you could help them but you still have to figure out how to get back home. You then said....
1212.title: Waking up to a Lucario

122.content: so your a female and so is lucario. now how small are you?
122.title: final choice before actual story

info.brief_description: a story about you and a giant lucario
info.description:
here's the idea!

you play a human that has been teleported from you world to the world of macro pokemen, more specifically, inside a macro lucarios house.

rules:
1. the only characters are you and the lucario.

2. you can breifly have another lucario in the story to mix with one you started with, the limit of chapters for this is 6

3. males and females are to be kept seperate from each other with the exception of rule 2

4. no scat or killing, everything else goes.

5. you can chose wether your character is a male or female at the beginging of the story

6.no one line sentences except for the first few chapters at the beagning

7. you can change size, but, only be a maximum height of 9 inches tall. Edit: Lucario's can grow and shrink as they please.

8, (optinial) you can start with either lucario having brought you to their universe or be unaware of your presence there.

have fun
